alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:11PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Eddy and northwestern Lea Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 411 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles west of McDonald to 17 miles west of Maljamar. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maljamar, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport and Loco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County
